            <id>bintray-schuettec-maven</id>
            <name>schuettec-maven</name>

        </repository>
    </distributionManagement>
    <build>
        <pluginManagement>
            <plugins>
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                    <artifactId>maven-source-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.0.1</version>
                    <executions>
                        <execution>
                            <id>attach-sources</id>
                            <goals>
                                <goal>jar</goal>
                            </goals>
                        </execution>
                    </executions>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                    <artifactId>maven-javadoc-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>3.0.0</version>
                    <executions>
                        <execution>
                            <id>attach-javadocs</id>
                            <goals>
                                <goal>jar</goal>
                            </goals>
                            <configuration>
                                <additionalparam>${javadoc.opts}</additionalparam>
                                <additionalJOption>-Xdoclint:none</additionalJOption>
                            </configuration>
                        </execution>
                    </executions>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                    <artifactId>maven-jar-plugin</artifactId>
                    <version>2.4</version>
                    <configuration>
                        <archive>
                            <manifest>
                                <addDefaultImplementationEntries>true</addDefaultImplementationEntries>
                                <addDefaultSpecificationEntries>true</addDefaultSpecificationEntries>
                            </manifest>
                            <manifestEntries>
                                <Bundle-Vendor>REMONDIS IT Services GmbH
                                    & Co. KG</Bundle-Vendor>
                                <Bundle-DocURL>https://github.com/remondis-it/pact-consumer-builder</Bundle-DocURL>
                                <Automatic-Module-Name>com.remondis.cdc.consumer.pactbuilder</Automatic-Module-Name>
                            </manifestEntries>
                        </archive>
                    </configuration>
                </plugin>
                <plugin>
                    <groupId>org.eclipse.m2e</groupId>
                    <artifactId>lifecycle-mapping</artifactId>
                    <version>1.0.0</version>
                    <configuration>
                        <lifecycleMappingMetadata>
                            <pluginExecutions>
                                <pluginExecution>
                                    <pluginExecutionFilter>
                                        <groupId>net.revelc.code.formatter</groupId>
                                        <artifactId>formatter-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                                        <versionRange>[1.0.0,)</versionRange>
                                        <goals>
                                            <goal>validate</goal>
                                        </goals>
                                    </pluginExecutionFilter>
                                    <action>
                                        <ignore />
                                    </action>
                                </pluginExecution>
                            </pluginExecutions>
                        </lifecycleMappingMetadata>
                    </configuration>
                </plugin>
            </plugins>
        </pluginManagement>
        <resources>
            <resource>
                <directory>src/main/resources</directory>
                <filtering>true</filtering>
            </resource>
        </resources>

        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.8.0</version>
                <configuration>
                    <debug>true</debug>
                    <optimize>true</optimize>
                    <encoding>${project.build.sourceEncoding}</encoding>
                <source>17</source><target>17</target><release>17</release></configuration>
            </plugin>

            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-javadoc-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-source-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-jar-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>net.revelc.code.formatter</groupId>
                <artifactId>formatter-maven-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>2.8.0</version>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <phase>validate</phase>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>validate</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
                <configuration>
                    <lineEnding>LF</lineEnding>
                    <configFile>${project.basedir}/shared/eclipse-formatter/eclipse-formatter-config.xml</configFile>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>2.22.1</version>
            </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-enforcer-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.0.0-M2</version>
                <executions>
                    <execution>
                        <id>enforce</id>
                        <configuration>
                            <rules>
                                <requireMavenVersion>
                                    <version>3.0.0</version>
                                </requireMavenVersion>
                                <requireReleaseDeps>
                                    <failWhenParentIsSnapshot>false</failWhenParentIsSnapshot>
                                    <message>No Snapshots Allowed!</message>
                                    <excludes>
                                        
                                        <exclude>${project.groupId}:*</exclude>
                                    </excludes>
                                </requireReleaseDeps>
                            </rules>
                            <fail>${enforcer.fail}</fail>
                        </configuration>
                        <goals>
                            <goal>enforce</goal>
                        </goals>
                    </execution>
                </executions>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </build>

I can see the issues. There are two main problems:

1. **CGLib issue**: CGLib is trying to access internal Java classes that are now restricted in Java 9+. This requires adding JVM arguments to open the necessary modules.
2. **Groovy compatibility issue**: The Pact library uses an old version of Groovy that doesn't support Java 17.

Now let me check the source files to understand better what's being used:
Now let's look at one of the failing test files to understand the issue better:

The issue is clear. The CGLib library (used by this project, version 3.2.9) doesn't work well with Java 9+ module system. We need to configure the Surefire plugin to add JVM arguments that open the necessary modules. Let me update the pom.xml:

input.new_str:
<plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-surefire-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>2.22.1</version>
                <configuration>
                    <argLine>
                        --add-opens java.base/java.lang=ALL-UNNAMED
                        --add-opens java.base/java.lang.invoke=ALL-UNNAMED
                        --add-opens java.base/java.io=ALL-UNNAMED
                        --add-opens java.base/java.util=ALL-UNNAMED
                        --add-opens java.base/java.math=ALL-UNNAMED
                        --add-opens java.base/sun.nio.ch=ALL-UNNAMED
                    </argLine>
                </configuration>
            </plugin>

input.file_text:
# Java 8 to Java 17 Migration Summary

## Project
**pact-consumer-builder** - A builder that generates JSON expectations for PACT consumer tests.

## Migration Date
January 29, 2026

## Changes Made

### 1. Updated Java Version
- **Changed from:** Java 8
- **Changed to:** Java 17
- **Files modified:** `pom.xml`
- **Properties updated:**
  - `maven.compiler.source`: 8 → 17
  - `maven.compiler.target`: 8 → 17
  - `maven.compiler.release`: 8 → 17

### 2. Fixed CGLib Compatibility Issues
CGLib (version 3.2.9) has issues with Java 9+ module system due to restricted access to internal Java classes.

**Solution:** Added JVM arguments to the maven-surefire-plugin to open necessary modules:
- `--add-opens java.base/java.lang=ALL-UNNAMED`
- `--add-opens java.base/java.lang.invoke=ALL-UNNAMED`
- `--add-opens java.base/java.io=ALL-UNNAMED`
- `--add-opens java.base/java.util=ALL-UNNAMED`
- `--add-opens java.base/java.math=ALL-UNNAMED`
- `--add-opens java.base/sun.nio.ch=ALL-UNNAMED`

### 3. Upgraded Groovy Version
The pact-jvm-consumer dependency (version 3.6.15) uses Groovy 2.5.6, which doesn't support Java 17.

**Solution:** 
- Excluded the old Groovy dependencies from pact-jvm-consumer
- Added explicit dependencies on Groovy 3.0.22 (which supports Java 17):
  - `org.codehaus.groovy:groovy:3.0.22`
  - `org.codehaus.groovy:groovy-json:3.0.22`

### 4. Added Jackson Databind Dependency
The project uses Jackson databind classes that are no longer transitively included.

**Solution:** Added explicit dependency:
- `com.fasterxml.jackson.core:jackson-databind:2.17.2` (compile scope)

### 5. Updated Jackson Datatype JSR310
Updated to match the Jackson databind version to avoid compatibility issues.

**Solution:** Updated version:
- `com.fasterxml.jackson.datatype:jackson-datatype-jsr310`: 2.8.6 → 2.17.2

### 6. Fixed Javadoc Plugin Configuration
The javadoc plugin couldn't find the javadoc executable when JAVA_HOME was not set.

**Solution:** Added explicit javadoc executable path configuration:
- `<javadocExecutable>${java.home}/bin/javadoc</javadocExecutable>`

## Dependency Changes Summary

### Updated Dependencies:
1. **com.fasterxml.jackson.datatype:jackson-datatype-jsr310**: 2.8.6 → 2.17.2
2. **com.fasterxml.jackson.core:jackson-databind**: Added 2.17.2 (new dependency)
3. **org.codehaus.groovy:groovy**: 2.5.6 → 3.0.22 (overridden)
4. **org.codehaus.groovy:groovy-json**: 2.5.6 → 3.0.22 (overridden)

### Dependencies Not Changed:
- cglib:cglib: 3.2.9 (kept same version, added JVM arguments for compatibility)
- au.com.dius:pact-jvm-consumer_2.12: 3.6.6 → 3.6.15 (minor update)

## Environment
- **Java Version:** OpenJDK 17.0.17
- **Maven Version:** 3.9.6
- **OS:** Linux (Ubuntu)

## Compatibility Notes

1. **CGLib Reflection:** The project uses CGLib for dynamic proxy generation. While we kept version 3.2.9, we had to add JVM arguments to open Java base modules for reflection access.

2. **Groovy Version:** The Groovy upgrade from 2.5.6 to 3.0.22 is a major version change. While this maintains backward compatibility for the use cases in this project, be aware of potential breaking changes if using advanced Groovy features.

3. **Jackson Version:** Updated Jackson from 2.8.6 to 2.17.2 (a major version jump). This is necessary for Java 17 support but may introduce API changes if using advanced Jackson features directly.

## Recommendations

1. **Testing:** Thoroughly test all functionality, especially:
   - JSON serialization/deserialization
   - Pact consumer test generation
   - Spring Data integration
   - Custom consumer builders

2. **Future Upgrades:** Consider upgrading to Pact JVM version 4.x or later in the future, as version 3.x is older. However, this would require significant API changes in the codebase.

3. **CGLib Alternative:** Consider migrating away from CGLib to ByteBuddy or other modern bytecode manipulation libraries that better support Java 9+ module system.

4. **Deprecated API:** Some Jackson methods used might be deprecated. Review compiler warnings for details.

## Conclusion

The migration from Java 8 to Java 17 was completed successfully. All tests pass, and the build completes without errors. The main challenges were:
1. CGLib compatibility with Java module system
2. Groovy version incompatibility with Java 17
3. Jackson dependency management

All issues were resolved while maintaining the existing API and functionality.

#!/bin/bash
# Verification script for Java 17 migration

echo "======================================"
echo "Java 17 Migration Verification Script"
echo "======================================"
echo ""

# Check Java version
echo "1. Checking Java version..."
java -version
echo ""

# Check Maven version
echo "2. Checking Maven version..."
mvn -version | head -5
echo ""

# Check pom.xml Java version settings
echo "3. Checking pom.xml Java version settings..."
grep -A 1 "maven.compiler.source" pom.xml
grep -A 1 "maven.compiler.target" pom.xml
grep -A 1 "maven.compiler.release" pom.xml
echo ""

# Check compiled bytecode version
echo "4. Checking compiled class bytecode version..."
if [ -f "target/classes/com/remondis/cdc/consumer/pactbuilder/ConsumerBuilder.class" ]; then
    MAJOR_VERSION=$(javap -v target/classes/com/remondis/cdc/consumer/pactbuilder/ConsumerBuilder.class | grep "major version" | awk '{print $3}')
    echo "Major version: $MAJOR_VERSION"
    if [ "$MAJOR_VERSION" == "61" ]; then
        echo "✓ Bytecode is Java 17 (major version 61)"
    else
        echo "✗ Bytecode is not Java 17 (expected 61, got $MAJOR_VERSION)"
    fi
else
    echo "⚠ Class files not found. Run 'mvn compile' first."
fi
echo ""

# Run tests
echo "5. Running tests..."
mvn clean test -q
TEST_RESULT=$?
echo ""

if [ $TEST_RESULT -eq 0 ]; then
    echo "✓ All tests passed"
else
    echo "✗ Some tests failed"
    exit 1
fi

# Run full verify
echo "6. Running full build verification..."
mvn verify -q
VERIFY_RESULT=$?
echo ""

if [ $VERIFY_RESULT -eq 0 ]; then
    echo "======================================"
    echo "✓ Migration verification SUCCESSFUL"
    echo "======================================"
    echo ""
    echo "Summary:"
    echo "- Java version: 17"
    echo "- All tests passed"
    echo "- Build completed successfully"
    echo "- Bytecode version: Java 17"
    exit 0
else
    echo "======================================"
    echo "✗ Migration verification FAILED"
    echo "======================================"
    exit 1
fi
